channel.title: Treasures of Montezuma on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Treasures of Montezuma on Game6r

item.title: Game Treasures of Montezuma - 1001 Nights
item.description: An exciting logic game in the style of “three in a row”. To begin with, try to move the colored stones in such a way as to make a line of three elements of the same shape and color. The figures lined up in this order burn out and new ones appear in their place. The more stones in a row disappear, the more points and bonuses you earn.

item.title: Game Treasures of Montezuma for girls
item.description: Embark on a mysterious journey to a sweet island. In this game, you have to remove from the field adjacent jelly candies of the same color by moving them around the screen with the mouse. To complete the level, a certain amount of time is given, for which you need to score the specified number of points.
